monsters.name: Aboleth
monsters.description: Enormous, antediluvian catfish covered in slime and tentacles. They hate all intelligent beings.

actions.name: Curse
actions.description: DC 15 CON or target gains a magical curse, turning into a deep one over 2d10 days.

actions.name: Enslave
actions.description: In place of attacks, one creature within far DC 15 WIS or aboleth controls for 1d4 rounds.

actions.name: Telepathic
actions.description: Read the thoughts of all creatures within far.

monsters.name: Acolyte
monsters.description: A religious trainee who knows basic rites and rituals.

actions.name: Healing Touch (WIS Spell)
actions.description: DC 11. Heal one creature within close for 1d4 HP.

monsters.name: Angel, Seraph
monsters.description: Beautiful, luminous humanoids with white-feathered wings.

actions.name: Bless
actions.description: 3/day, touch one target to give it a luck token.

monsters.name: Angel, Domini
monsters.description: Winged, flawless humans glowing with bronze sunlight.

actions.name: Horn
actions.description: All enemies in near DC 15

monsters.name: Angel, Principi
monsters.description: Serene humans sculpted from alabaster. Golden orbs for eyes.

actions.name: Moonlight Aura
actions.description: Hostile spells targeting the principi are DC 15.

actions.name: Truesight
actions.description: Can see all invisible creatures and objects.

monsters.name: Archangel
monsters.description: A radiant being with a crown of fire, snowy wings, golden armor, and a blazing greatsword.

actions.name: Command
actions.description: DC 18 CHA to resist an archangel's command.

actions.name: Crown of Fire
actions.description: Hostile spells targeting the archangel are extreme (DC 18) to cast.

monsters.name: Ape, Snow
monsters.description: White-haired, carnivorous gorillas that stalk the high mountains and live in caves.

actions.name: Thick Fur
actions.description: Cold immune.

monsters.name: Ape
monsters.description: Hooting, omnivorous apes that live in trees.

monsters.name: Ankheg
monsters.description: Horse-sized, rust-brown insects. They burrow vast, underground warrens into the bedrock.

monsters.name: Animated Armor
monsters.description: An old suit of armor magically animated by a vengeful spirit.

actions.name: Statue
actions.description: When standing still, looks exactly like a suit of armor.

monsters.name: Apprentice
monsters.description: A cloaked magician with a thin, freshly bound spellbook.

actions.name: Beguile (INT Spell)
actions.description: DC 11. Focus.

actions.name: Magic Bolt (INT Spell)
actions.description: DC 11. 1d4 damage to one target within far.

monsters.name: Archmage
monsters.description: A wizened magic-user crackling with arcane power.

actions.name: Death Bolt (INT Spell)
actions.description: DC 15.

actions.name: Enervate (INT Spell)
actions.description: DC 14.

actions.name: Focus
actions.description: One target within near is stupefied for the duration.

actions.name: Fireblast (INT Spell)
actions.description: DC 14. 4d6 damage to all within a near-sized cube within far.

actions.name: Float (INT Spell)
actions.description: Self. DC 14. Fly double near for 5 rounds.

actions.name: Mithralskin (INT Spell)
actions.description: Self. DC 14. AC becomes 18 for 5 rounds.

actions.name: Void Step (INT Spell)
actions.description: Self and up to 4 willing targets. DC 15.

monsters.name: Assassin
monsters.description: A black-cloaked, skulking killer.

actions.name: Execute
actions.description: Deals x3 damage against surprised targets.

monsters.name: Azer
monsters.description: Dwarves with bronze, metallic skin and flames in place of hair. Gifted blacksmiths.

actions.name: Impervious
actions.description: Fire immune.

monsters.name: Badger
monsters.description: Fierce, clawed burrowers with black-and-white face stripes.

actions.name: Rage
actions.description: 1/day, immune to morale checks, +1d4 damage (3 rounds).

monsters.name: Bandit
monsters.description: Hard-bitten rogue in tattered leathers and a hooded cloak.

actions.name: Ambush
actions.description: Deal an extra die of damage when undetected.

monsters.name: Basilisk
monsters.description: Massive, muscled lizards with six legs and gray, tough hide.

actions.name: Petrify
actions.description: Any creature that touches the basilisk or meets its gaze, DC 15 CON or petrified.

monsters.name: Bat, Giant
monsters.description: Leathery, eagle-sized mammal with a taste for flesh.

monsters.name: Bat, Swarm
monsters.description: A whirling cloud of screeching, bloodthirsty bats.

monsters.name: Bear, Brown
monsters.description: A hulking, swaying brute with claws as long as a finger.

actions.name: Crush
actions.description: Deals an extra die of damage if it hits the same target with both claws.

monsters.name: Bear, Polar
monsters.description: A mighty, white bear that thrives in arctic environments.

actions.name: Crush
actions.description: Deals an extra die of damage if it hits the same target with both claws.

actions.name: Thick Fur
actions.description: Cold immune.

monsters.name: Beastman
monsters.description: A cave hominid with scraggly fur and a stone-tipped spear.

actions.name: Brutal
actions.description: +1 damage with melee weapons (included).

monsters.name: Berserker
monsters.description: Howling, battleraging warriors.

actions.name: Rage
actions.description: 1/day, immune to morale checks, +1d4 damage (3 rounds).

monsters.name: Boar
monsters.description: Ornery wild pig with bristly, russet hair and yellowed tusks.

actions.name: Gore
actions.description: Deals an extra die of damage if it hits the same target with both tusks.

monsters.name: Black Pudding
monsters.description: A black, ice-cold mass of sludge.

actions.name: Impervious
actions.description: Only damaged by fire.

actions.name: Corrosive
actions.description: Wood or metal that touches the ooze dissolves on a d6 roll of 1-3.

monsters.name: Brain Eater
monsters.description: Purple, gaunt humanoids with squidlike heads and four face tentacles. They live in complex, alien societies underground and eat humanoid brains.

actions.name: Hear Thoughts
actions.description: Can hear the surface thoughts of all intelligent creatures within near.

actions.name: Latch
actions.description: Tentacles attach to hit targets, automatically hitting the next round (DC 12 STR on turn to remove 1d4 tentacles). If all four remain latched onto the same humanoid target for 1 round, the target's brain is ripped out and devoured.

actions.name: Mind Blast
actions.description: Fills a near-sized cube extending from brain eater.

actions.name: Mind Control
actions.description: One target in near

monsters.attackText: 4 tentacle +5 (1d8 + latch) or 1 mind blast or 1 mind control

monsters.name: Bugbear
monsters.description: Brutish, bat-eared goblinoids covered in brown fur.

actions.name: Stealthy
actions.description: ADV on checks to sneak and hide.

monsters.name: Bulette
monsters.description: A hulking, shark-sized lizard with a steely, arrow-shaped carapace and a massive gullet.

actions.name: Leap
actions.description: Jump up to near in height and double near in distance, then make 2 bite attacks.

monsters.name: Camel
monsters.description: Ornery, tan-furred desert beasts.

monsters.name: Cave Brute
monsters.description: A hulking, insectoid beast with long mandibles, four eyes, and thick arms covered in bristles.

actions.name: Bewilder
actions.description: Creatures within near that see the cave brute's eyes,

monsters.name: Cave Creeper
monsters.description: Chittering, green centipedes the size of horses. Their grasping tentacles are coated in a paralytic venom.

actions.name: Toxin
actions.description: DC 12 CON or paralyzed 1d4 rounds.

monsters.name: Centaur
monsters.description: Herd-dwelling beings with the upper body of a human and lower body of a horse.

monsters.name: Centipede, Giant
monsters.description: Blood-red, feathery centipedes the size of a human arm. Their bite injects a burning poison that cramps muscles.

actions.name: Poison
actions.description: DC 12 CON or paralyzed 1d4 rounds.

monsters.name: Centipede, Swarm
monsters.description: A crawling mass of weaving, sinuous centipedes.

actions.name: Poison
actions.description: DC 12 CON or paralyzed 1d4 rounds.

monsters.name: Chimera
monsters.description: A monstrous beast with a half-goat, half-lion body, wide dragon wings, and the heads of a goat, lion, and dragon.

actions.name: Fire Breath
actions.description: Fills a near-sized cube extending from chimera.

monsters.name: Chuul
monsters.description: Brown, horse-sized lobster bugs with tentacles and pincers.

actions.name: Grab
actions.description: DC 15 STR or held in pincer.

monsters.name: Cloaker
monsters.description: A midnight blue manta ray with a bony tail and crescent-shaped maw above its belly. It swoops through deep, lightless caverns.

actions.name: Phantoms
actions.description: 1/day, in place of attacks. Create 3 illusory duplicates that disappear when hit. Determine randomly if an attack hits cloaker or illusions.

actions.name: Screech
actions.description: Enemies within double near DC 15 WIS or DISADV on attacks and checks 1d4 rounds.

monsters.name: Cockatrice
monsters.description: A molting, lizard-chicken hybrid with a crimson, razorlike crest.

actions.name: Petrify
actions.description: DC 12 CON or petrified.

monsters.name: Couatl
monsters.description: A human-sized snake with scales made of jewels and a corona of iridescent feathers.

actions.name: Change Shape
actions.description: In place of attacks, transform into any similarly-sized creature.

actions.name: Poison
actions.description: DC 15 CON or fall into natural, deep sleep for 1d8 hours.

actions.name: Restore
actions.description: In place of attacks, touch one creature to remove a curse, affliction, or heal 3d8 HP.

monsters.name: Crab, Giant
monsters.description: A wagon-sized, armored crab with two crushing pincers.

actions.name: Crush
actions.description: DC 15 STR or target takes 1d8 damage.

monsters.name: Crocodile
monsters.description: Fat, scaly reptiles with stumpy legs and long, thrashing tails.

monsters.name: Cultist
monsters.description: A cloaked, wild-eyed zealot chanting the guttural prayers of a dark god.

actions.name: Fearless
actions.description: Immune to morale checks.

actions.name: Deathtouch (WIS Spell)
actions.description: DC 12. 2d4 damage to one creature within close.

monsters.name: Cyclops
monsters.description: Reclusive, one-eyed giants towering 20' high. They live simply on remote farmlands.

monsters.name: Darkmantle
monsters.description: A floating, black octopus with rows of red eyes and a webbed skirt of tentacles.

actions.name: Darkness
actions.description: Extinguish all light sources in near.

monsters.name: Deep One
monsters.description: Cultish, amphibious fish-people with bulbous eyes. They lurk in deep water and sunless caverns.

actions.name: Sunblind
actions.description: Blinded in bright light.

monsters.name: Demon, Balor
monsters.description: Colossal, horned bat-beasts wreathed in the flames of hell itself. Their mighty swords and cracking whips of fire can slice through stone.

actions.name: Impervious
actions.description: Fire immune. Only damaged by magical sources.

actions.name: Grab
actions.description: DC 18 STR or target bound in whip. 2d6 damage per round held, DC 18 STR on turn to break free. In place of fire whip attack, balor can fling a grabbed target double near on its turn.

actions.name: Hellfire
actions.description: DC 18 DEX or 2d8 damage per round until flames extinguished.

monsters.attackText: 3 greatsword +10 (2d12 + hellfire) and 1 fire whip (near) +10 (2d6 + grab)

monsters.name: Demon, Glabrezu
monsters.description: Horse-headed, fanged creatures who walk upright and have four arms; two shriveled, and two ending in hulking pincers.

actions.name: Crush
actions.description: DC 15 STR or target takes 2d8 damage.

monsters.name: Demon, Dretch
monsters.description: Green, pig-faced demons with thick claws and an oily stench.

actions.name: Gas
actions.description: All in near DC 12 CON or blinded for 1d4 rounds.

monsters.name: Demon, Marilith
monsters.description: Hissing, armored women with six limbs and the lower bodies of giant snakes. Six whirling blades flash in their hands.

actions.name: Parry
actions.description: Trade 2 longsword attacks next round to deflect a melee attack that would hit.

monsters.name: Demon, Vrock
monsters.description: Wagon-sized, filthy vultures with four limbs, midnight-blue skin, and a rash of mangy feathers.

actions.name: Carrion Mist
actions.description: Each time vrock is hit, 3:6 chance of carrion mist in near-sized cube centered on vrock. All enemies DC 15 CON or violent vomiting 1d4 rounds.

actions.name: Screech
actions.description: All enemies in double near DC 12 WIS or DISADV on checks and attacks for 1d4 rounds.

monsters.name: Archdevil
monsters.description: A stunningly beautiful, horned human with burning, red eyes and a halo of seven black stars. Two stitched-up gashes weep blood from its shoulder blades.

actions.name: Impervious
actions.description: Fire immune. Only damaged by magical sources.

actions.name: Crown of Darkness
actions.description: All hostile spells are reflected at caster with a spellcasting check less than 20.

actions.name: Soulbind
actions.description: All targets within near

monsters.name: Devil, Barbed
monsters.description: Lanky, green-mottled fiends bristling with hooked spines.

actions.name: Barb
actions.description: Each spine sticks, dealing 1d4 damage each round. DC 12

monsters.name: Devil, Cubi
monsters.description: Entrancing humanoids with bat wings and devilish charm.

actions.name: Change Shape
actions.description: In place of attacks, transform into any similarly-sized humanoid.

actions.name: Charm
actions.description: One humanoid in near

actions.name: Drain
actions.description: The target takes 1d6 WIS damage. A target reduced to 0

monsters.name: Devil, Erinyes
monsters.description: Raven-winged, resplendent beings in polished, black armor and helms with curved horns.

actions.name: Poison
actions.description: DC 15 CON or target's eyes go jet black and it turns on its allies for 1d4 rounds. DC 15

monsters.name: Devil, Horned
monsters.description: Iron-scaled hellions as big as ogres with weighty ram horns, lashing tails, and leathery wings. They are opportunistic and craven in battle.

actions.name: Iron Hide
actions.description: Half damage from non-magical weapons.

monsters.name: Devil, Imp
monsters.description: Cat-sized, red devils with oversized wings and tail, tiny horns, and cowardly demeanors.

actions.name: Impervious
actions.description: Fire immune.

actions.name: Contract
actions.description: Can grant mighty boons and patronage on behalf of an archdevil in exchange for a sworn soul. ADV on related

actions.name: Poison
actions.description: DC 12 CON or fitful sleep for 1d4 hours.

monsters.name: Pterodactyl
monsters.description: Long-beaked beasts with wide, triangular wings. Large enough to carry off a human.

actions.name: Grab
actions.description: DC 15 STR or held. DC 15

monsters.name: Tyrannosaurus
monsters.description: Towering, bipedal lizards with a massive head, jaws, and neck.

monsters.name: Triceratops
monsters.description: Plodding herbivores with a wide, bony skull frill and three horns.

actions.name: Charge
actions.description: Move up to double near in straight line and make 1 horn attack. If hit, x3 damage.

monsters.name: Brachiosaurus
monsters.description: Colossal, long-necked tree grazers. Slow and peaceful.

monsters.name: Plesiosaurus
monsters.description: Aquatic reptiles as big as elephants. Flat flippers and narrow, toothy maws on long necks.

monsters.name: Velociraptor
monsters.description: Fast, turkey-sized raptors with vicious toe claws. Pack hunters.

actions.name: Clever
actions.description: +1d4 damage when attacking with surprise.

monsters.name: Djinni
monsters.description: Azure-blue, jovial humanoids made of air and roiling wind. Infused with potent magic.

actions.name: Impervious
actions.description: Only damaged by magical sources.

actions.name: Whirlwind
actions.description: Transform into a lashing tornado. All enemies within near DC 18 DEX or thrown 2d100 feet in a random direction.

actions.name: Wish
actions.description: Cast wish once a week for a mortal, no spellcasting check.

monsters.name: Doppelganger
monsters.description: Gray, featureless humanoids that delight in sowing chaos.

actions.name: Change Shape
actions.description: In place of attacks, transform into any similarly-sized humanoid.

actions.name: Telepathy
actions.description: Can secretly hear the surface thoughts of all humanoids within near.

monsters.name: Dragon, Desert
monsters.description: The smell of ozone precedes this desert-dwelling dragon. Its dazzling scales of brass and lapis lazuli shimmer in the baking heat.

actions.name: Stormblood
actions.description: Electricity immune.

actions.name: Lightning Breath
actions.description: A straight line (5' wide) extending double near from dragon. DC 15 DEX or 4d8 damage (DISADV on check if wearing metal armor).

actions.name: Mirage
actions.description: 1/day, in place of attacks.

monsters.name: Dragon, Fire
monsters.description: Blood-red scales cover the hide of this mighty, volcanic wyrm. Leaping flames glow at the back of its throat.

actions.name: Fireblood
actions.description: Fire immune.

actions.name: Fire Breath
actions.description: Fills a double near-sized cube extending from dragon. DC 15 DEX or 6d10 damage.

monsters.name: Dragon, Forest
monsters.description: The smell of wet loam follows this dragon. Its jade scales bristle with barbed thorns.

actions.name: Animate Plants
actions.description: 1/day, in place of attacks. Vines grab at all enemies within double near of dragon. DC 15 DEX or unable to move 1d4 rounds.

actions.name: Poison Breath
actions.description: Fills a near-sized cube extending from dragon. DC 15 CON or 3d8 damage.

monsters.name: Dragon, Frost
monsters.description: Prismatic ice lines the horns, spines, and wings of this pearly dragon. Clouds of steam hiss from its ice-rimed jaws.

actions.name: Frostblood
actions.description: Cold immune.

actions.name: Ice Breath
actions.description: Fills a double near-sized cube extending from dragon. DC 15 DEX or 4d8 damage and frozen for 1 round.

monsters.name: Dragon, Sea
monsters.description: A warm sea breeze blows around this amphibious, gold-scaled wyrm. A beard of tendrils covers its snout, and a blue mane billows along its neck.

actions.name: Steam Breath
actions.description: Fills a double near-sized cube extending from dragon. DC 15 DEX or 4d12 damage.

actions.name: Water Spout
actions.description: Fills a near-sized cube within far. DC 15 STR or creatures inside flung 2d100 feet in a random direction.

monsters.attackText: 4 rend +10 (2d10) or 1 steam breath or 1 water spout

monsters.name: Dragon, Swamp
monsters.description: This black, wingless beast slithers through dank swamps.

actions.name: Smog Breath
actions.description: Fills a near-sized cube extending from dragon.

monsters.name: Drow
monsters.description: A graceful, shadowy elf that pounces like a spider.

actions.name: Poison
actions.description: DC 15 CON or sleep.

actions.name: Sunblind
actions.description: Blinded in bright light.

monsters.name: Drow, Priestess
monsters.description: A statuesque female drow with a crown of metal spider webs and an imperious gaze.

actions.name: Poison
actions.description: DC 15 CON or paralyzed 1d4 rounds.

actions.name: Sunblind
actions.description: Blinded in bright light.

actions.name: Snuff (WIS Spell)
actions.description: DC 12.

actions.name: DC 14
actions.description: Summon 2d4 loyal giant spiders that appear within near.

actions.name: Web (WIS Spell)
actions.description: DC 13. A near-sized cube of webs within far immobilizes all inside it for 5 rounds. DC 15 STR on turn to break free.

monsters.name: Drow, Drider
monsters.description: A monstrosity with the body of a giant spider and torso of a drow.

actions.name: Poison
actions.description: DC 15 CON or paralyzed 1d4 rounds.

actions.name: Sunblind
actions.description: Blinded in bright light.

monsters.name: Druid
monsters.description: A wizard of the wilds holding a knotted staff and wearing a mossy cloak of deep viridian.

actions.name: Barkskin (INT Spell)
actions.description: Self. DC 13.

actions.name: Conjure Flames (INT Spell)
actions.description: DC 12. One target in far takes 2d6 damage.

actions.name: Imbue (INT Spell)
actions.description: Self. DC 13. Staff becomes a +3 magic weapon for 10 rounds.

actions.name: Summon Bear (INT Spell)
actions.description: DC 14.

actions.name: Thunderclap (INT Spell)
actions.description: DC 13.

monsters.name: Dryad
monsters.description: A coy, emerald-skinned fey covered in leaves. It bonds with and protects a tree.

actions.name: Charm
actions.description: Near, one creature, DC 14

actions.name: Meld
actions.description: Step inside bonded tree.

monsters.name: Duergar
monsters.description: Gray-skinned, greedy dwarves with bald pates and white beards. They dwell in somber castles deep within the earth filled with stolen treasures and enslaved prisoners.

actions.name: Enlarge
actions.description: 1/day, +1d6 damage on melee attacks and ADV on STR checks for 3 rounds.

actions.name: Invisibility
actions.description: 1/day, turn invisible for 3 rounds. Ends if duergar attacks.

actions.name: Sunblind
actions.description: Blinded in bright light.

monsters.name: Dung Beetle, Giant
monsters.description: A trundling, barrel-sized beetle with a T-shaped horn.

actions.name: Knock
actions.description: DC 9 STR or pushed a close distance and fall down.

monsters.name: Efreeti
monsters.description: Blood-red, towering humanoids formed of lava and ash. Short, black horns and snarling grins.

actions.name: Impervious
actions.description: Only damaged by magical sources. Fire immune.

actions.name: Wall of Flame
actions.description: 1/day, 20' high curtain of fire, double near length. Touching it deals 4d8 damage. Lasts 2d4 rounds.

actions.name: Wish
actions.description: Cast wish once a week for a mortal, no spellcasting check.

monsters.name: Elemental, Air
monsters.description: A howling tornado of wind.

actions.name: Impervious
actions.description: Only damaged by magical sources.

actions.name: Whirlwind
actions.description: All within close DC 15 DEX or flung 2d20 feet in random direction.

monsters.name: Elemental, Earth
monsters.description: A thundering pillar of earth.

actions.name: Impervious
actions.description: Only damaged by magical sources.

actions.name: Avalanche
actions.description: All within close DC 15

monsters.name: Elemental, Fire
monsters.description: A roaring column of flames.

actions.name: Impervious
actions.description: Only damaged by magical sources. Fire immune.

actions.name: Inferno
actions.description: All within near DC 15

monsters.name: Elemental, Water
monsters.description: A crashing vortex of water.

actions.name: Impervious
actions.description: Only damaged by magical sources.

actions.name: Whirlpool
actions.description: All within close DC 15

monsters.name: Elephant
monsters.description: Mighty mammals with tough hide, flappy ears, and a trunk.

actions.name: Charge
actions.description: Move up to double near in straight line and make 1 tusks attack. If hit, x3 damage.

monsters.name: Elf
monsters.description: Ethereal, ageless fey-people infused with ancient magic.

actions.name: Feyblood
actions.description: ADV on DEX checks while in the natural wilds.

monsters.name: Ettercap
monsters.description: Bipedal, eight-eyed spiderfolk with spindly legs and purple fur.

actions.name: Poison Web
actions.description: One target stuck in place and 1d4 damage/round.

monsters.name: Fairy
monsters.description: Miniature fey folk with fluttering moth or butterfly wings.

actions.name: Poison
actions.description: DC 12 CON or fall into deep sleep for 1d4 hours.

monsters.name: Frog, Giant
monsters.description: Human-sized frogs with warty skin and long, sticky tongues.

actions.name: Tongue
actions.description: 1 creature in near DC 12

monsters.name: Gargoyle
monsters.description: Leering, winged fiends that look like stone statues. They can hold perfectly still for long stretches of time.

actions.name: Impervious
actions.description: Only damaged by magical sources.

monsters.name: Gelatinous Cube
monsters.description: A translucent cube of slime that silently mows through tunnels.

actions.name: Engulf
actions.description: DC 12 STR or trapped inside cube. Touch attack auto-hits engulfed targets each round. DC 12 STR on turn to escape. Fail checks if paralyzed.

actions.name: Rubbery
actions.description: Half damage from stabbing weapons.

actions.name: Toxin
actions.description: DC 15 CON or paralyzed 1d4 rounds.

monsters.name: Ghast
monsters.description: Greater ghouls who retain the intelligence they had in life.

actions.name: Undead
actions.description: Immune to morale checks.

actions.name: Carrion Stench
actions.description: Living creatures

actions.name: Paralyze
actions.description: DC 12 CON or paralyzed 1d4 rounds.

monsters.name: Ghoul
monsters.description: Gray-skinned, slavering undead with whipping tongues and flat, reptilian faces.

actions.name: Undead
actions.description: Immune to morale checks.

actions.name: Paralyze
actions.description: DC 12 CON or paralyzed 1d4 rounds.

monsters.name: Ghost
monsters.description: A wavering spirit with a face contorted in rage or sadness.

actions.name: Greater Undead
actions.description: Immune to morale checks. Only damaged by silver or magical sources.

actions.name: Incorporeal
actions.description: In place of attacks, become corporeal or incorporeal.

actions.name: Life Drain
actions.description: 1d4 CON damage.

actions.name: Possess
actions.description: Must be corporeal. One target, close range. Contested

actions.name: CHA check
actions.description: If ghost wins, it inhabits target's body and controls it for 2d4 rounds.

monsters.attackText: 2 death touch +5 (1d8 + life drain) or 1 possess

monsters.name: Giant, Cloud
monsters.description: Pale, angular giants with blue-gray hair, light eyes, and silk robes. They do not allow outsiders into their enclaves.

actions.name: Alert
actions.description: ADV on checks to detect sneaking or hiding creatures.

monsters.name: Giant, Fire
monsters.description: Bulky, muscled giants with coppery skin and red hair. Heavily armored in iron plate mail studded with bronze rivets.

actions.name: Fireblood
actions.description: Fire immune.

monsters.name: Giant, Frost
monsters.description: Blue-skinned warriors with broad shoulders and braided hair. They sound war horns during their frequent raids to pillage nearby settlements.

actions.name: Frostblood
actions.description: Cold immune.

monsters.name: Giant, Stone
monsters.description: Lean, sinewy giants with stony skin and deep-set eyes. They are quiet and poised, often sitting motionless for days at a time.

actions.name: Stone Hide
actions.description: Half damage from stabbing and cutting weapons.

monsters.name: Giant, Goat
monsters.description: Highland-dwelling, barbaric giants with goatlike legs, horns, and horizontal pupils.

monsters.name: Giant, Storm
monsters.description: Regal titans with sea-green skin, flowing white hair, and thundering voices. They breathe water as easily as air.

actions.name: Stormblood
actions.description: Electricity immune.

actions.name: Lightning Bolt
actions.description: 3/day, 5' wide line extending far from giant. All creatures in line DC 15 DEX or 5d10 damage. DISADV on check if in water.

monsters.name: Giant, Hill

actions.name: A floating mass of rubbery skin crusted with barnacles
actions.description: Its ten eyestalks writhe like snakes, and a deep, circular scar mars its central body, blinding what was once a large eye above a lipless maw. The Ten-Eyed Oracle stalks the Shadowdark, burbling mad prophesies and somehow moving freely between the lightless fathoms of the earth. The keepers of the deep lore suspect The

actions.name: Legendary
actions.description: Only damaged by magical sources. Hostile spells targeting The Ten-Eyed Oracle are DC 18 to cast.

actions.name: Eyestalk Ray
actions.description: Each ray can shoot once per round and target one creature or an object up to 1,000 pounds (up to four on same target). 1. Charm. DC 15 CHA or become ally for 1d4 rounds. 2. Hold. DC 15 STR or paralyzed 1d4 rounds. 3. Sleep. DC 15 WIS or asleep 1d4 rounds. 4. Polymorph. DC 15 INT or turned into vermin for 1d4 rounds. 5. Cancel. DC 15 DEX or all magical effects on target end. 6. Confusion. DC 15 WIS or attack a random ally within near. 7. Telekinesis. DC 15 STR or hover target up to double near. 8. Disintegrate. DC 15 DEX or 5d8 damage (object destroyed). 9. Petrify. DC 15 CON or petrified. 10. Death. DC 15 CON or drop to 0 HP with a death timer of 1.

monsters.name: The Tarrasque
monsters.description: A colossal, four-legged reptile with crocodilian jaws, amber scales, and a diamond-hard, spiked carapace. It towers overhead like a mountain, able to swallow entire villages in one gulp. The tarrasque hibernates deep in the earth or at the bottom of the sea for centuries, only awakening long enough to fill its vast belly in an indiscriminate rampage of terror and destruction. There is only one tarrasque, and it is the most dreaded creature to walk the earth. "RRRRRRAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAGHHHHHH!" -The Tarrasque

actions.name: Legendary
actions.description: Only damaged by magical sources. Hostile spells targeting the tarrasque are DC 18 to cast.

actions.name: Deep Dweller

actions.name: Permanent Death

actions.name: Rampage

actions.name: Reflective Carapace

actions.name: Regeneration

actions.name: Sever

actions.name: Swallow
actions.description: DC 18 STR or swallowed whole. Total darkness inside and 4d10 damage per round. Tarrasque regurgitates all swallowed if dealt at least 30 damage in one round to the inside of its gullet.

monsters.attackText: 4 thrash (near) +13 (3d10 + sever) and 1 bite (near) +13 (5d10 + sever + swallow)

monsters.name: The Wandering Merchant
monsters.description: A cheerful merchant who appears to be a hale, middle-aged human man with a handlebar mustache. He wears a white shirt, breeches, and leather apron, and he hauls a towering backpack bursting at the seams. Few know the merchant's true nature and origins, though some theorize he is an immortal being or a god (they are not entirely incorrect). The Wandering Merchant always has something useful, far-flung, or incredible to sell at a reasonable price, and there's no telling when or where he'll show up next... "Fancy meeting you here, at the bottom of a pit trap! I just so happen to have this lovely rope for sale..." -The Wandering Merchant

actions.name: Legendary
actions.description: Only damaged by magical sources. Hostile spells targeting The Wandering Merchant are DC 18 to cast.

actions.name: Amulet of Rahm-Hotep
actions.description: In place of attacks, teleport to a random location in the multiverse.

actions.name: Bottomless Bag
actions.description: Contains 200 gear slots in magical sub-pockets.

actions.name: Weighs as much as a normal backpack
actions.description: The Wandering Merchant can summon it to himself from anywhere by snapping his fingers.

actions.name: Dice of Truth

actions.name: Lop

actions.name: Reckoning
actions.description: Any creature who steals from The Wandering Merchant develops a curse. Over the next 2d8 days, that creature turns into a cockatrice. This curse can only be lifted by a wish spell or by returning the stolen goods.

actions.name: Strange Lands
actions.description: The Wandering Merchant does not suffer any ill effects from the natural environment he does not wish to suffer.

actions.description: Deals +1 damage while an ally is close.

actions.description: Fills a near-sized cube extending from winter wolf. DC 15 DEX or 3d8 damage.

actions.description: 1d4 CON damage.

actions.name: Poison
actions.description: DC 15 CON or take 2d10 damage.

monsters.name: Zombie
monsters.description: Lurching and decomposed undead that hunt in mobs.

actions.name: Undead
actions.description: Immune to morale checks.

actions.name: Relentless
actions.description: If zombie reduced to 0 HP by a non-magical source,

spells.name: Acid Arrow
spells.description: You conjure a corrosive bolt that hits one foe, dealing 1d6 damage a round. The bolt remains in the target for as long as you focus.

spells.name: Alarm
spells.description: You touch one object, such as a door threshold, setting a magical alarm on it. If any creature you do not designate while casting the spell touches or crosses past the object, a magical bell sounds in your head.

spells.name: Alter Self
spells.description:
You magically change your physical form, gaining one feature that modifies your existing anatomy.

For example, you can grow functional gills on your neck or bear claws on your fingers. This spell can't grow wings or limbs.

spells.name: Animate Dead
spells.description: You touch one humanoid's remains, and it rises as a zombie or skeleton under your control. The remains must have at least three limbs and its head intact.The undead creature acts on your turn. After 1 day, the creature collapses into grave dust.

spells.name: Antimagic Shell
spells.description:
An invisible, near-sized cube of null-magic appears centered on you.

Within the cube, no spells can be cast. Magic items and spells have no effect in the zone, and no magic can enter.

The cube moves with you. Spells such as dispel magic have no effect on it.

Another antimagic shell does not affect this one.

spells.name: Arcane Eye
spells.description:
You conjure an invisible, grape- sized eye within range.

You can see through the eye. It can see in the dark out to near range, fly near on your turn, and squeeze through openings as narrow as a keyhole.

spells.name: Augury
spells.description:
You interpret the meaning of supernatural portents and omens.

Ask the GM one question about a specific course of action. The GM says whether the action will lead to âwealâ or âwoe.â

spells.name: Bless
spells.description: One creature you touch gains a luck token.

spells.name: Blind/deafen
spells.description: You utter a divine censure, blinding or deafening one creature you can see in range.The creature has disadvantage on tasks requiring the lost sense.

spells.name: Burning Hands
spells.description:
You spread your fingers with thumbs touching, unleashing a circle of flame that roars out to a close area around where you stand.

Creatures within the area of effect take 1d6 damage, and flammable objects catch fire.

spells.name: Charm Person
spells.description:
You magically beguile one humanoid of level 2 or less within near range, who regards you as a friend for the duration.

The spell ends if you or your allies do anything to hurt it that it notices.

The target knows you magically enchanted it after the spell ends.

spells.name: Cleansing Weapon
spells.description: One weapon you touch is wreathed in purifying flames. It deals an additional 1d4 damage (1d6 vs. undead) for the duration.

spells.name: Cloudkill
spells.description:
A putrid cloud of yellow poison fills a near-sized cube within range. It spreads around corners.

Creatures inside the cloud are blinded and take 2d6 damage at the beginning of their turns.A creature of LV 9 or less that ends its turn fully inside the cloud dies.

spells.name: Command
spells.description:
You issue a verbal command to one creature in range who can understand you. The command must be one word, such as âkneel.â The target obeys the command for as long as you focus.

If your command is ever directly harmful to the creature, it may make a CHA check vs. your last spellcasting check. On a success, the spell ends.

spells.name: Commune
spells.description:
You seek your god's counsel. Ask the GM up to three yes or no questions. The GM truthfully answers "yes" or "no" to each.

If you cast this spell more than once in 24 hours, treat a failed spellcasting check for it as a critical failure instead.

spells.name: Confusion
spells.description: You mesmerize one creature you can see in range. The target can't take actions, and it moves in a random direction on its turn. If the target is LV 9+, it may make a WIS check vs. your last spellcasting check at the start of its turn to end the spell.

spells.name: Control Water
spells.description: You move and shape water. You can cause a section of water up to 100 feet in width and depth to change shape, defy gravity, or flow in a different direction.

spells.name: Create Undead
spells.description:
You conjure a vengeful undead creature to do your bidding.

When you cast this spell, you choose to summon either a wight or wraith. It appears next to you and is under your control.

The undead creature acts on your turn. After 1 day, it melts away into smoke.

spells.name: Cure Wounds
spells.description:
Your touch restores ebbing life.

Roll a number of d6s equal to 1 + half your level (rounded down). One target you touch regains that many hit points.

spells.name: Detect Magic
spells.description: You can sense the presence of magic within near range for the spell's duration. If you focus for two rounds, you discern its general properties. Full barriers block this spell.

spells.name: Dimension Door
spells.description: You teleport yourself and up to one other willing creature within close to any point you can see.

spells.name: Disintegrate
spells.description:
A green ray shoots from your finger and turns a creature or object into ash.

A target creature of LV 5 or less instantly dies. If it is LV 6+, it takes 3d8 damage instead.

A non-magical object up to the size of a large tree is destroyed.

spells.name: Dispel Magic
spells.description: End one spell that affects one target you can see in range.

spells.name: Divination
spells.description:
You throw the divining bones or peer into the blackness between the stars, seeking a portent.

You can ask the GM one yes or no question. The GM truthfully answers "yes" or "no." 

If you cast this spell more than once in 24 hours, treat a failed spellcasting check for it as a critical failure instead.

spells.name: Divine Vengeance
spells.description: You become the divine avatar of your god's wrath, wreathed in holy flames or a black aura of smoldering corruption.For the spell's duration, you can fly a near distance, your weapons are magical, and you have a +4 bonus to your weapon attacks and damage.

spells.name: Dominion
spells.description:
Mighty beings come to your aid.

The beings must have a combined total of 16 levels or less. Chaotic PCs summon demons/devils, and lawful or neutral PCs summon angels.

The beings act of free will to aid you on your turn. After 10 rounds, they return to their realms.

You cannot cast this spell again until you complete penance.

spells.name: Fabricate
spells.description: This spell can't target creatures.You turn a tree-sized collection of raw materials into a finished work. For example, you convert a pile of bricks or rocks into a bridge. The finished work converts back to raw materials when the spell ends.

spells.name: Feather Fall
spells.description:
You may make an attempt to cast this spell when you fall.

Your rate of descent slows so that you land safely on your feet.

spells.name: Fireball
spells.description: You hurl a small flame that erupts into a fiery blast. All creatures in a near-sized cube around where the flame lands take 4d6 damage.

spells.name: Fixed Object
spells.description: An object you touch that weighs no more than 5 pounds becomes fixed in its current location. It can support up to 5,000 pounds of weight for the duration of the spell.

spells.name: Flame Strike
spells.description: You call down a holy pillar of fire, immolating one creature you can see within range. The target takes 2d6 damage.

spells.name: Floating Disk
spells.description: You create a floating, circular disk of force with a concave center. It can carry up to 20 gear slots. It hovers at waist level and automatically stays within near of you. It can't cross over drop- offs or pits taller than a human.

spells.name: Gaseous Form
spells.description:
You and your gear turn into a cloud of smoke for the spell's duration.

You can fly and pass through any gap that smoke could. You can sense the terrain and any movement around you out to a near distance.

You can't cast spells while in this form.

spells.name: Fly
spells.description: Your feet lift from the ground, and you take to the air like a hummingbird. You can fly near for the spell's duration and are able to hover in place.

spells.name: Heal
spells.description: One creature you touch is healed to full hit points.You cannot cast this spell again until you complete a rest.

spells.name: Hold Monster
spells.description: You paralyze one creature you can see within range.If the target is LV 9+, it may make a STR check vs. your last spellcasting check at the start of its turn to end the spell.

spells.name: Holy Weapon
spells.description: One weapon you touch is imbued with a sacred blessing. The weapon becomes magical and has +1 to attack and damage rolls for the duration.

spells.name: Hold Person
spells.description: You magically paralyze one humanoid creature of LV 4 or less you can see within range.

spells.name: Hold Portal
spells.description: You magically hold a portal closed for the duration. A creature must make a successful STR check vs. your spellcasting check to open the portal. The knock spell ends this spell.

spells.name: Illusion
spells.description:
You create a convincing visible and audible illusion that fills up to a near-sized cube in range.

The illusion cannot cause harm, but creatures who believe the illusion is real react to it as though it were.

A creature who inspects the illusion from afar must pass a WIS check vs. your last spellcasting check to perceive the false nature of the illusion.Touching the illusion also reveals its false nature.

spells.name: Invisibility
spells.description: A creature you touch becomes invisible for the spell's duration.The spell ends if the target attacks or casts a spell.

spells.name: Judgement
spells.description:
You instantly banish a creature you touch, sending it and all possessions it carries to face the judgment of your god.

You can banish an intelligent creature of LV 10 or less.

When the creature returns in 5 rounds, it has been healed to full hit points if its deeds pleased your god. It has been reduced to 1 hit point if its deeds angered your god. If your god can't judge its actions, it is unchanged.

spells.name: Knock
spells.description: A door, window, gate, chest, or portal you can see within range instantly opens, defeating all mundane locks and barriers.This spell creates a loud knock audible to all within earshot.

spells.name: Lay To Rest
spells.description:
You instantly send an undead creature you touch to its final afterlife, destroying it utterly.

You can target an undead creature of LV 9 or less.

spells.name: Levitate
spells.description: You can float a near distance vertically per round on your turn. You can also push against solid objects to move horizontally.

spells.name: Light
spells.description: One object you touch glows with bright, heatless light, illuminating out to a near distance for 1 hour of real time.

spells.name: Lightning Bolt
spells.description:
You shoot a blue-white ray of lightning from your hands, hitting all creatures in a straight line out to a far distance.

Creatures struck by the lightning take 3d6 damage.

spells.name: Mage Armor
spells.description: An invisible layer of magical force protects your vitals. Your armor class becomes 14 (18 on a critical spellcasting check) for the spell's duration.

spells.name: Magic Circle
spells.description:
You conjure a circle of runes out to near-sized cube centered on yourself and name a type of creature (for example, demons).

For the spell's duration, creatures of the chosen type cannot attack or cast a hostile spell on anyone inside the circle. The chosen creatures also can't possess, compel, or beguile anyone inside the circle.

spells.name: Magic Missile
spells.description:
You have advantage on your check to cast this spell.

A glowing bolt of force streaks from your open hand, dealing 1d4 damage to one target.

spells.name: Mass Cure
spells.description: All allies within near range of you regain 2d6 hit points.

spells.name: Mirror Image
spells.description:
You create a number of illusory duplicates of yourself equal to half your level rounded down (minimum 1). The duplicates surround you and mimic you.

Each time a creature attacks you, the attack misses and causes one of the duplicates to evaporate. If all of the illusions have disappeared, the spell ends.

spells.name: Misty Step
spells.description: In a puff of smoke, you teleport a near distance to an area you can see.

spells.name: Passwall
spells.description:
A tunnel of your height opens in a barrier you touch and lasts for the duration.

The passage can be up to near distance in length and must be in a straight line.

spells.name: Pillar Of Salt
spells.description:
A creature you target turns into a statue made of hardened salt.

You can target a creature you can see of LV 5 or less.If you successfully focus on this spell for 3 rounds in a row, the transformation becomes permanent.

spells.name: Plane Shift
spells.description: You fold space and time, transporting yourself and all willing creatures within close range to a location on another plane of your choice.Unless you have been to your intended location before, you appear in a random place on the destination plane.

spells.name: Polymorph
spells.description:
You transform a creature you touch into another natural creature you choose of equal or smaller size. Any gear the target carries melds into its new form.

The target gains the creature's physical stats and features, but it retains its non-physical stats and features.

If the target goes to 0 hit points, it reverts to its true form at half its prior hit points.

You can target any willing creature with this spell, or an unwilling creature whose level is less than or equal to half your level rounded down (min. 1).

spells.name: Power Word Kill
spells.description:
You utter the Word of Doom. One creature you target of LV 9 or less dies if it hears you.

Treat a failed spellcasting check for this spell as a critical failure, and roll the mishap with disadvantage.

spells.name: Prismatic Orb
spells.description:
You send a strobing orb of energy streaking toward a target within range.

Choose an energy type from fire, cold, or electricity. The orb deals 3d8 damage and delivers a concussive blast of the chosen energy type.If the energy type is anathema to the target's existence (for example, cold energy against a fire elemental), the orb deals double damage to it instead.

spells.name: Prophecy
spells.description:
You commune directly with your god for guidance.Ask the GM one question.The GM answers the question truthfully using the knowledge your god possesses. Deities are mighty, but not omniscient.

You cannot cast this spell again until you complete penance.

spells.name: Protection From Energy
spells.description: One creature you touch becomes impervious to the wild fury of the elements.Choose fire, cold, or electricity. For the spell's duration, the target is immune to harm from energy of the chosen type.

spells.name: Protection From Evil
spells.description:
For the spell's duration, chaotic beings have disadvantage on attack rolls and hostile spellcasting checks against the target. These beings also can't possess, compel, or beguile it.

When cast on an already-possessed target, the possessing entity makes a CHA check vs. the last spellcasting check. On a failure, the entity is expelled.

spells.name: Rebuke Unholy
spells.description:
You rebuke creatures who oppose your alignment, forcing them to flee. You must present a holy symbol to cast this spell.

If you are lawful or neutral, this spell affects demons, devils, and outsiders. If you are chaotic, this spell affects angels and natural creatures of the wild.Affected creatures within near of you must make a CHA check vs. your spellcasting check. If a creature fails by 10+ points and is equal to or less than your level, it is destroyed. Otherwise, on a fail, it flees from you for 5 rounds.

spells.name: Resilient Sphere
spells.description:
You conjure a weightless, glassy sphere around you that extends out to close range.

For the spell's duration, nothing can pass through or crush the sphere.

You can roll the sphere a near distance on your turn.

spells.name: Regenerate
spells.description: A creature you touch regains 1d4 hit points on your turn for the duration. This spell also regrows lost body parts.

spells.name: Restoration
spells.description: With the touch of your hands, you expunge curses and illnesses. One curse, illness, or affliction of your choice affecting the target creature ends.

spells.name: Scrying
spells.description:
You look into a crystal ball or reflecting pool, calling up images of a distant place.

For the spell's duration, you can see and hear a creature or location you choose that is on the same plane.

This spell is DC 18 to cast if you try to scry on a creature or location that is unfamiliar to you.

Each round, creatures you view may make a WIS check vs. your last spellcasting check. On a success, they become aware of your magical observation.

spells.name: Shapechange
spells.description:
You transform yourself and any gear you carry into another natural creature you've seen of level 10 or less. You assume the creature's physical stats and features, but you retain your non-physical stats and features (including INT, WIS, and CHA).

If you go to 0 HP while under the effects of this spell, you revert to your true form at 1 HP.

spells.name: Sending
spells.description: You send a brief, mental message to any creature with whom you are familiar who is on the same plane.

spells.name: Shield Of Faith
spells.description: A protective force wrought of your holy conviction surrounds you. You gain a +2 bonus to your armor class for the duration.

spells.name: Silence
spells.description: You magically mute sound in a near cube within the spell's range. Creatures inside the area are deafened, and any sounds they create cannot be heard.

spells.name: Sleep
spells.description:
You weave a lulling spell that fills a near-sized cube extending from you. Living creatures in the area of effect fall into a deep sleep if they are LV 2 or less.

Vigorous shaking or being injured wakes them.

spells.name: Speak With Dead
spells.description:
A dead body you touch answers your questions in a distant, wheezing voice.

You can ask the dead body up to three yes or no questions (one at a time). The GM truthfully answers "yes" or "no" to each.

If you cast this spell more than once in 24 hours, treat a failed spellcasting check for it as a critical failure instead.

spells.name: Smite
spells.description: You call down punishing flames on a creature you can see within range. It takes 1d6 damage.

spells.name: Stoneskin
spells.description: Your skin becomes like granite. For the spell's duration, your armor class becomes 17 (20 on a critical spellcasting check).

spells.name: Summon Extraplanar
spells.description:
You reach into the outer planes, summoning forth a creature.You summon an elemental or outsider of LV 7 or less. The creature is under your control and acts on your turn.

If you lose focus on this spell, you lose control of the creature and it becomes hostile toward you and your allies.

You must pass a spellcasting check on your turn to return the creature to the outer planes.

spells.name: Telekinesis
spells.description:
You lift a creature or object with your mind. Choose a target that weighs 1,000 pounds or less.

You can move it a near distance in any direction and hold it in place.

spells.name: Teleport
spells.description:
You and any willing creatures you choose within close range teleport to a location you specify on your same plane.

You can travel to a known teleportation sigil or to a location you've been before. Otherwise, you have a 50% chance of arriving off-target.

spells.name: Turn Undead
spells.description: You rebuke undead creatures, forcing them to flee. You must present a holy symbol to cast this spell.Undead creatures within near of you must make a CHA check vs. your spellcasting check. If a creature fails by 10+ points and is equal to or less than your level, it is destroyed. Otherwise, on a fail, it flees from you for 5 rounds.

spells.name: Wall Of Force
spells.description:
You lift your hands, conjuring a transparent wall of force.

The thin wall must be contiguous and can cover a near-sized area in width and length. You choose its shape.Nothing on the same plane can physically pass through the wall.

spells.name: Wish
spells.description:
This mighty spell alters reality.

Make a single wish, stating it as exactly as possible. Your wish occurs, as interpreted by the GM.

Treat a failed spellcasting check for this spell as a critical failure, and roll the mishap with disadvantage.

spells.name: Web
spells.description: You create a near-sized cube of sticky, dense spider web within the spell's range. A creature stuck in the web can't move and must succeed on a STR check vs. your spellcasting check to free itself.

spells.name: Wrath
spells.description: Your weapons become magical +2 and deal an additional d8 damage for the spell's duration.

spells.name: Zone Of Truth
spells.description: You compel a creature you can see to speak truth. It can't utter a deliberate lie while within range.
